lead_paragraph: Whitewater churns into foam as double-ended paddles windmill one-person boats into position. The paddles go up in the air as the boats slide through red or green gates, then the furious wind milling begins again.

headline.print_headline: Paddle Up: A Guide to Whitewater Racing in Rio
headline.main: Paddle Up: A Guide to Whitewater Racing in Rio

snippet: Whitewater churns into foam as double-ended paddles windmill one-person boats into position. The paddles go up in the air as the boats slide through red or green gates, then the furious wind milling begins again....
